public class MessageList extends ObjectList<Message> implements MessageCounter
A list of messages that listens for and adds incoming messages. Only messages that are accepted by a Matcher (or Filter subclass) are added.

List Methods

This list of messages can be rebroadcast with Broadcaster.transmitAll(Iterable). A filtered list of messages can be retrieved with matching(Matcher) and a list of formatted messages with formatted().

Superinterface Methods

The superinterface MessageCounter provides methods that count messages and collect statistics.

Factory Methods

  • emptyMessageList()

Counting Messages

  • count(Message.Status)
  • count(Class)
  • countWorseThanOrEqualTo(Message.Status)
  • MessageCounter.countWorseThanOrEqualTo(Class)

Filtering

  • matching(Matcher)
  • messagesOfType(Class)

Rebroadcasting

  • broadcastTo(Listener)

jonathanl (shibo)
